channel.title: Help with Client Compile + Run
channel.description:
Hi, so I'm using the Emerald Dream cheat client for 317 but I get these errors: So I'm trying to run a client but whenever I compile it, it says, "javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options press any key to continue . . ."
This is my compiler code: @echo off color a title Compiler By Kiryn "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_51\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
And whenever I run the run.bat it says main class gui not found. This is my run code: @echo off color a Title Emerald Dream Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit
If anyone knows what is wrong, please comment. What should my CLASSPATH and Path be? they are currently C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe for both classpath and path.

item.title: Help with Client Compile + Run
item.dc:creator: @jerry2121 jerry2121
item.description:
@jerry2121 wrote:

Hi, so I’m using the Emerald Dream cheat client for 317 but I get these errors:
So I’m trying to run a client but whenever I compile it, it says,
“javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
press any key to continue . . .”

This is my compiler code:
@echo off
color a
title Compiler By Kiryn
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_51\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause

And whenever I run the run.bat
it says main class gui not found.
This is my run code:
@echo off
color a
Title Emerald Dream Client
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

If anyone knows what is wrong, please comment. What should my CLASSPATH and Path be?
they are currently C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe for both classpath and path.

Read full topic
